snippet.title: Road Trip Snack Mix
snippet.description: I make this every time we go on a road trip; it's great for snacking on the road. You can either pack it in a couple of large bowls, or into individual...

snippet.title: Rocky Road Fudge Bars
snippet.description: This is a recipe from my soon to be Mother in Law. It's a family favorite that I made for the first time with rave reviews. I've been told it...

snippet.title: Rocky Road Squares
snippet.description: These are always demanded for when I make multiple batches of goodies. Note: cooking time is cooling time.

snippet.title: Rocky Road Candy
snippet.description: Found this years ago in a magazine, I have added the coconut to it so if you are not keen on that ingredient just leave it out. In The Netherlands I have...

snippet.title: River Road Spinach Madeleine
snippet.description: This is my adaptation of the recipe in the River Road Recipes cookbook from the Junior League of Baton Rouge, La. This has been around at least since...

snippet.title: Rocky Road
snippet.description: Yummy Rocky Road for chocky lovers. Put a few in a cellophane bag and tie with green and red ribbon for a tasty Christmas gift.

snippet.title: Rocky Road Squares
snippet.description: These yummy bars start with a brownie mix.

snippet.title: Light Rocky Road Brownies
snippet.description: These taste like heaven and are low fat to boot. I love to make these when I'm craving chocolate but don't want to totally blow my diet.

snippet.title: rocky road fudge
snippet.description: very easy. we make this at every family gathering. once you try it you'll be making it at every one of your get togethers.
